name: CubeShaker
description:
Made In 50 Hours For GMTK 2022

2D Roguelike Procedural Generation game where you try to pass as many levels as possible getting upgrades along the way!

Controls:

Purchase Upgrade: Be on top of your chosen upgrade and press 'E'

Move Left: A

Move Right: D

Use ability: Left Mouse Click

Jump: Space

Quick double jump: Double press Space when on ground
